message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer you the product for $11500. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $12000, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10500. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $12000
